verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: When the sunshine is folded up.
verse.verse_2: And when the stars fall off.
verse.verse_3: And when the mountains are made to move.
verse.verse_4: And when the pregnant she camels are abandoned.
verse.verse_5: And when the beasts are gathered together.
verse.verse_6: And when the seas are kindled,
verse.verse_7: And when the souls are paired.
verse.verse_8: And when the female buried alive is questioned about.
verse.verse_9: For what crime was she killed?
verse.verse_10: And when the sheets of actions are opened,
verse.verse_11: And when the heaven is taken off from its place,
verse.verse_12: And when the Hell is caused to flare up.
verse.verse_13: And when the Paradise is brought near,
verse.verse_14: (Then) each soul shall know what it has brought forward.
verse.verse_15: Then I swear by those that recede.
verse.verse_17: And by the night when it departs.
verse.verse_18: And by the morning when it breathes.
verse.verse_19: Undoubtedly, this is the recitation of a noble Messenger.
verse.verse_20: Who is powerful, dignified in the presence of the Lord of the Throne.
verse.verse_21: There He is obeyed, He is trustworthy.
verse.verse_22: And your companion is not mad.
verse.verse_23: And undoubtedly, he saw him on the bright horizon.
verse.verse_24: And he is not niggardly as to the disclosing of unseen.
verse.verse_25: And the Quran is not the recitation of saitan (Devil) the accursed.
verse.verse_27: This is not but an admonition to the entire world.
verse.verse_28: For him among you who desire to be straight.
verse.verse_29: And what you desire, but only this that Allah the Lord of the world desires.
